Keywords: Avengers , Celebrity , Mystical
Real Name: Wanda Maximoff
Special Powers
THE BOOK OF THE DAMNED: The Scarlet Witch starts the game with a Disney+ #s008 Darkhold equipped. // When she uses its EFFECT, she may instead choose 2 listed powers.
THANKS FOR THE LESSON: POWER: Generate a Chaos special marker [MAX 1] in The Scarlet Witch's square. // If The Scarlet Witch is more than 3 squares from a Chaos marker, remove her Chaos marker. // Other characters within 3 squares of her Chaos marker can't use powers.
I DON'T UNDERSTAND THIS POWER, BUT I WILL: KNOCKBACK, Penetrating/Psychic Blast. // When The Scarlet Witch knocks back an opposing character, after resolutions choose one:
*Remove an action token from her.
*Heal her 1 click.
I CAN FIX THIS!: STOP. Super Senses, Invincible. // When this click is revealed, for the rest of the game, The Scarlet Witch has Cosmic Energy team ability.
Trade The Scarlet Witch Want The Scarlet Witch

Bat-Phreak
JiDay, an interesting option for the remaining 50-pts could be AFFE105B Invisible Woman. Sue's 19-Defend can help keep Vision a bit more safe, sharing Sue's 19-Defend via a Barrier when Wanda gets knocked down a bit will help keep Wanda in the game, and TK will help Wanda's mobility.
May 29, 2022
JiDay
WOTR011 Black Widow is a solution. You still have a thematic Team (Avengers), and The Scarlet Witch can use Stealth. Add MSDP043 Vision on his 50 pts starting line. This way, The Scarlet Witch can choose Perplex and PC to protect herself while Vision uses Outwit and his Trait for FREE. And you still have 50 points to complete your team. If every figures could be "hurt" like this one ... It would not be the same game.
May 15, 2022
Goop
Definitely a bigger nastier version of agatha but the lack of stealth really hurts the chaos marker gimmick. She can be ranged attacked a lot easier. Fortunately her defensive powers are all very strong and can heal past stop clicks which is always brutal for opponents to deal with. Both are great pieces for their cost.
